001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
025
026/**
027 * Since a node doesn't have a base URI in Metaschema, this is an alias for the
028 * document-uri function.
029 */
030public final class FnPath {
031  private static final String NAME = "path";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_NO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextDependent()
038      .focusDependent()
039      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
040      .returnZeroOrOne()
041      .functionHandler(FnPath::executeNoArg)
042      .build();
043
044  @NonNull
045  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
046      .name(NAME)
047      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
048      .deterministic()
049      .contextIndependent()
050      .focusIndependent()
051      .argument(IArgument.builder()
052          .name("arg1")
053          .type(INodeItem.class)
054          .zeroOrOne()
055          .build())
056      .returnType(IStringItem.class)
057      .returnZeroOrOne()
058      .functionHandler(FnPath::executeOneArg)
059      .build();
060
061  private FnPath() {
062    // disable construction
063  }
064
065  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
066  @NonNull
067  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeNoArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
068      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
069      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
070      IItem focus) {
071
072    INodeItem item = FunctionUtils.requireTypeOrNull(INodeItem.class, focus);
073
074    ISequence<IStringItem> retval;
075    if (item == null) {
076      retval = ISequence.empty();
077    } else {
078      retval = ISequence.of(IStringItem.valueOf(item.toPath(IPathFormatter.METAPATH_PATH_FORMATER)));
079    }
080    return retval;
081  }
082
083  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
084  @NonNull
085  private static ISequence<IStringItem> executeOneArg(@NonNull IFunction function,
086      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
087      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
088      IItem focus) {
089
090    return fnPath(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * An implementation of XPath 3.1
095   * <a href="https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-path">fn:path</a>.
096   *
097   * @param sequence
098   *          a Metapath sequence containing an item to get the Metapath for
099   * @return a sequence containing the generated Metapath
100   */
101  @NonNull
102  public static ISequence<IStringItem> fnPath(@NonNull ISequence<?> sequence) {
103    IItem item = sequence.getFirstItem(true);
104
105    ISequence<IStringItem> retval;
106    if (item == null) {
107      retval = ISequence.empty();
108    } else {
109      try {
110        retval = ISequence.of(fnPath((INodeItem) item));
111      } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
112        throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
113            item,
114            String.format("Expected a '%s', but received a '%s'",
115                INodeItem.class.getName(),
116                item.getClass().getName()),
117            ex);
118      }
119    }
120    return retval;
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Generates a Metapath for the provided item.
125   *
126   * @param item
127   *          the item to get the Metapath for
128   * @return the generated Metapath
129   */
130  @Nullable
131  public static IStringItem fnPath(@Nullable INodeItem item) {
132    return item == null ? null : IStringItem.valueOf(item.toPath(IPathFormatter.METAPATH_PATH_FORMATER));
133  }
134}
